title: Gamebreaking Bug (Sion)
body:
Was playing Sion just now on my smurf and suddenly, about 20 minutes in my Q and Ultimate wouldn't cast. Tried turning on smartcast and re-binding QWER to it, but they wouldn't cast. Flash and TP worked, W and E could cast (e only when not on smartcast and I could click) but Q and Ultimate wouldn't cast for the remaining gametime (And yes, I died, went into passive and respawned, didn't fix)

Might want to disable him, if that happened in ranked I would be insanely pissed off.
